p: The questionnaire was adapted from a similar instrument used in a previous pilot study (Personal communication: N Naicker; unpublished data) conducted among 38 EHPs working in the Johannesburg Metropolitan Municipality Area. Post-piloting questions were refined and grouped into sections. The questionnaire comprised an introductory section on socio-demographics (name of province, district and local authority, age and gender) and 22 climate change-related questions presented in three sections: (1) knowledge, (2) perceptions and (3) preparedness (TableÂ 1). All of the questionnaires were in English.
